hero.title: Caritas Mutare
hero.subtitle: Catholic Community Development Organization
hero.description: Serving the Diocese of Mutare, Zimbabwe with compassion, hope, and community development initiatives.

about.title: About Caritas Mutare
about.missionText: To serve the poor and promote integral human development through community-based programs that address the root causes of poverty and injustice.
about.visionText: A just and compassionate society where every person can live with dignity and reach their full potential.
about.valuesText: We are guided by Catholic social teaching, working with communities to create lasting change through solidarity, subsidiarity, and the common good.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.description: We implement various community development programs across the Diocese of Mutare

education.title: Education & Training
education.description: Providing access to quality education and vocational training for children and adults

healthcare.title: Healthcare & Nutrition
healthcare.description: Improving health outcomes through medical care, nutrition programs, and health education

agriculture.title: Agriculture & Food Security
agriculture.description: Supporting sustainable farming practices and food security initiatives

livelihood.title: Livelihood Support
livelihood.description: Creating economic opportunities through microfinance and skills development

soupkitchen.title: Soup Kitchen
soupkitchen.description: Monthly community meals served every last Friday to support vulnerable families

emergency.title: Emergency Response
emergency.description: Providing immediate assistance during crises and natural disasters

donate.title: Support Our Mission
donate.description: Your donation helps us continue our important work in community development
donate.name: Full Name
donate.thankYou: Thank you for your generous donation!

volunteer.title: Volunteer with Us
volunteer.description: Join our mission to serve the community and make a difference
volunteer.thankYou: Thank you for your interest in volunteering!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with us for more information or to get involved

footer.description: Caritas Mutare is committed to serving the community through Catholic social teaching and community development programs.
